data.name: EMAIL_ALREADY_REGISTERED

data.name: EXPIRED_SESSION
data.value: Your session has expired. Please sign in again to continue.

data.name: INVALID_PASSWORD
data.value: Password must be 6 to 50 characters long and contain at least three of the following: uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols.

data.name: INVALID_SESSION
data.value: We couldn't find a valid session. Please log in to access this feature.

data.name: NAME_EMPTY
data.value: Name must not be empty.

data.name: NO_TOKEN
data.value: Authentication token was not provided.

data.name: ONLY_IMAGES_ACCEPTED
data.value: Only PNG, JPG, JPEG, and WEBP images are accepted.

data.name: PASSWORD_DIFFERENT_CURRENT_PASSWORD
data.value: The entered password does not match the current password.

data.name: PASSWORD_EMPTY
data.value: Password must not be empty.

data.name: UNKNOWN_ERROR
data.value: An unknown error occurred.

data.value: Invalid JSON format.

data.name: INVALID_REQUEST_BODY
data.value: The request body is invalid or missing.

data.value: Please enter a valid username (letters, numbers, underscores, and dashes only).

data.name: PASSWORDS_NOT_MATCH
data.value: The passwords do not match.

data.value: User not found in the database.

data.value: Invalid episode count.

data.name: ANIME_EXCEEDS_LIMIT
data.value: The anime name exceeds the 256-character limit.

data.name: ANIME_AIRED_UNTIL_EARLY_FROM
data.value: The "aired until" date cannot be earlier than the "aired from" date.

data.name: ANIME_AIRED_UNTIL_FILLED_AIRED_FROM_NOT_FILLED
data.value: When "aired until" is provided, "aired from" must also be provided.

data.name: EPISODE_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
data.value: When the anime status is "finished", the number of episodes must be provided.

data.name: GENRES_CANNOT_BE_NULL
data.value: Anime genres cannot be null.

data.name: STUDIOS_CANNOT_BE_NULL
data.value: Anime studios cannot be null.

data.name: ANIME_AIRED_FROM_REQUIRED_WHEN_FINISHED
data.value: When the anime status is "finished", "aired from" must be specified.

data.name: ANIME_AIRED_UNTIL_REQUIRED_WHEN_FINISHED
data.value: When the anime status is "finished", "aired until" must be specified.

data.name: ANIME_AIRED_FROM_REQUIRED_WHEN_AIRING
data.value: When the anime status is "airing", "aired from" must be specified.
